text.tspan: The Malthusian trap: Population and real wages, England, 1280 to 1600
Unit 2 'Technology, population, and growth’ Section 2.9 'The Malthusian trap and long-term economic
stagnation' in The CORE Team, The Economy. Available at: https://tinyco.re/20918330 [Figure 2.18]
Note: The data points at each year are calculated averages over the succeeding decade. CC-BY-ND-NC
